name: lambda_sample
description: an example of typescript project able to compile to an AWS lambda function ready to deploy as zip file

scripts.bundle: webpack dist/index.js --mode development --target node --devtool false --output-library-target umd -o index.js
scripts.zip-node_modules: npm i ; npm run build-ts && rm -rf lambda_sample.zip node_modules; npm i --production ; cp index-export.js index.js; zip -r --exclude=\*.git\* --exclude=\*.DS_Store\* lambda_sample.zip .
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run bundle && npm run zip-bundle
